CustomField.description: Sets how Application is exposed to BAM. Per Customer requires an Asset to be created for it to be exposed in BAM for a customer., Private will never be exposed to BAM but allows behind the scenes Applications to be onboarded and exposed through Authorisation API
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets how Application is exposed to BAM. Per Customer requires an Asset to be created for it to be exposed in BAM for a customer., Private will never be exposed to BAM but allows behind the scenes Applications to be onboarded and exposed through Auth API
CustomField.label: Configuration Model
